item.name: api.ingka.ikea.com

query.description: csv list of fields of the response that should be expanded, f.e. "StoresList", "Restock"

variable.description: alpha-2 lowercase country code to request availabilities from

request.description:
Retreive the number of available items in stock for a specific product id in all stores of a specific country.

Some stores may also provide restock information.

response.name: Get Product Availabilites US

query.description: csv list of fields of the response that should be expanded, f.e. "StoresList", "Restock"

variable.description: alpha-2 lowercase country code to request availabilities from

item.description:
The IKEA website is using the ingka API to receive product availabilities for a specific country. The API can return the number of items in stock for all stores in a country.

[https://github.com/Ephigenia/ikea-availability-checker](https://github.com/Ephigenia/ikea-availability-checker)
